answerText: fume hood[10] Extra care should be taken when working with certain functional groups, such as this one, which is symbolized NO2 and is found in explosives such as TNT.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 1 | 7 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] When using chemicals that can evolve dangerous gases, its common to perform any work in one of these units, which contains a negative-pressure ventilator and a moveable glass sash.
